title: The Scourage Mistress' Bane
content:
The Scourage Mistress' Bane Effect Chance to inflict a 1d4 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws on target. If the attacker still has 25% or more hit points, they take 1d6 Piercing themselves. Equipment Ritual Axe

The Scourage Mistress' Bane

Chance to inflict a 1d4 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws on target. If the attacker still has 25% or more hit points, they take 1d6 Piercing themselves.

The Scourage Mistress' Bane is an Equipment Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Equipment Feature
